mapper.select: SELECT t.id, t.account, t.password, t.nickname, t.avatar, t.motto, t.qq, t.status FROM d_user t WHERE t.account=#{account} AND t.password=#{password};
SELECT count(1) FROM d_user t WHERE t.account=#{account} OR t.nickname=#{nickname}
SELECT count(1) FROM d_inv_code dic WHERE dic.inv_code = #{invitecode} AND dic.used = 0;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO d_user ( account, password, nickname, motto, avatar, create_time ) VALUES ( #{account}, #{password}, #{nickname}, #{motto}, #{avatar}, NOW() )
mapper.update: UPDATE d_inv_code dic SET dic.used = 1, dic.user_id = #{id} WHERE dic.inv_code = #{invitecode}
